title: Find Arabella's Parents

Your next set of choices will look like this:

Where will she go, then? Why not? I'm not sending her out there alone. Fine with me. She's already outstayed her welcome.

Withers will go on to explain that Arabella holds a power beyond reckoning, but that her power is currently unbalanced. When Arabella asks if Withers is making her leave, he tells her not to worry as the Weave knows her purpose and will guide her. Your next set of choices will lo
